text: How do you find the cause of error when you're developing something in Base and a sysimage fails to compile? I've been commenting out all the new code and uncommenting chunk by chunk until I find the broken line, but I'm sure there's a better way. For example I get this error, which seems completely unrelated as I haven't touched toml_parser.jl or version.jl.

elements.text: How do you find the cause of error when you're developing something in Base and a sysimage fails to compile? I've been commenting out all the new code and uncommenting chunk by chunk until I find the broken line, but I'm sure there's a better way. For example I get this error, which seems completely unrelated as I haven't touched toml_parser.jl or version.jl.

text: Have a look at the first line of the error message. `LoadError("toml_parser.jl", 327, ArgumentError("invalid pre-release identifier: \"DEV.121\""))))` tells you that you used an invalid version string in line 327 of toml_parser

elements.text: Have a look at the first line of the error message.
tells you that you used an invalid version string in line 327 of toml_parser

text: That doesn't make sense, as `git stash && make` works and like I said I haven't touched toml_parser.jl.

elements.text: works and like I said I haven't touched toml_parser.jl.

text: I changed `split` in strings/util.jl, which is used a few times in version.jl. I think I understand the problem now.
